verses.verse: And Nadav <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu <S%H30><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aharon <S%H175><s%>, took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> either <S%H376><s%> of them his censer <S%H4289><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> therein <S%H2004><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> thereon, and offered <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8686><s%> strange <S%H2114><s%> <S%H8801><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, which he commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> them not.

And there went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> from the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and devoured <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them, and they died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Then Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Aharon <S%H175><s%>, This is it that the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, I will be sanctified <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in them that come nigh <S%H7138><s%> me, and before <S%H6440><s%> all the people <S%H5971><s%> I will be glorified <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8735><s%>. And Aharon <S%H175><s%> held his peace <S%H1826><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Mishael <S%H4332><s%> and Elzaphan <S%H469><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Uzziel <S%H5816><s%> the uncle <S%H1730><s%> of Aharon <S%H175><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Come near <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, carry <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8798><s%> your brethren <S%H251><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> out <S%H2351><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%>.

So they went near <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and carried <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them in their coats <S%H3801><s%> out <S%H2351><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%>; as Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> had said <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Aharon <S%H175><s%>, and unto Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and unto Ithamar <S%H385><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%>, Uncover <S%H6544><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not your heads <S%H7218><s%>, neither rend <S%H6533><s%> <S%H8799><s%> your clothes <S%H899><s%>; lest ye die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and lest wrath <S%H7107><s%> <S%H8799><s%> come upon all the people <S%H5712><s%>: but let your brethren <S%H251><s%>, the whole house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, bewail <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the burning <S%H8316><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath kindled <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And ye shall not go out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, lest ye die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: for the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> is upon you. And they did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Aharon <S%H175><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Do not drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> nor strong drink <S%H7941><s%>, thou, nor thy sons <S%H1121><s%> with thee, when ye go <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> into the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, lest ye die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: it shall be a statute <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%>:
And that ye may put difference <S%H914><s%> <S%H8687><s%> between holy <S%H6944><s%> and unholy <S%H2455><s%>, and between unclean <S%H2931><s%> and clean <S%H2889><s%>;

And that ye may teach <S%H3384><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> all the statutes <S%H2706><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto them by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Aharon <S%H175><s%>, and unto Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and unto Ithamar <S%H385><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%> that were left <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the meat offering <S%H4503><s%> that remaineth <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8737><s%> of the offerings <S%H801><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>, and eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8798><s%> it without leaven <S%H4682><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%>: for it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%>:

And ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it in the holy <S%H6918><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>, because it is thy due <S%H2706><s%>, and thy sons <S%H1121><s%> ' due <S%H2706><s%>, of the sacrifices <S%H801><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>: for so I am commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8795><s%>.

And the wave <S%H8573><s%> breast <S%H2373><s%> and heave <S%H8641><s%> shoulder <S%H7785><s%> shall ye eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in a clean <S%H2889><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>; thou, and thy sons <S%H1121><s%>, and thy daughters <S%H1323><s%> with thee: for they be thy due <S%H2706><s%>, and thy sons <S%H1121><s%> ' due <S%H2706><s%>, which are given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8738><s%> out of the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

The heave <S%H8641><s%> shoulder <S%H7785><s%> and the wave <S%H8573><s%> breast <S%H2373><s%> shall they bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> with the offerings made by fire <S%H801><s%> of the fat <S%H2459><s%>, to wave <S%H5130><s%> <S%H8687><s%> it for a wave offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; and it shall be thine, and thy sons <S%H1121><s%> ' with thee, by a statute <S%H2706><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>; as the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> diligently <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8800><s%> sought <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the goat <S%H8163><s%> of the sin offering <S%H2403><s%>, and, behold, it was burnt <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8795><s%>: and he was angry <S%H7107><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and Ithamar <S%H385><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aharon <S%H175><s%> which were left <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8737><s%> alive, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Wherefore have ye not eaten <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the sin offering <S%H2403><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>, seeing it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%>, and 'Elohim hath given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it you to bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, to make atonement <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8763><s%> for them before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> ?

Behold <S%H2005><s%>, the blood <S%H1818><s%> of it was not brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8717><s%> in within <S%H6441><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> place: ye should indeed <S%H398><s%> <S%H8800><s%> have eaten <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place, as I commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%>.

And Aharon <S%H175><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, Behold, this day <S%H3117><s%> have they offered <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8689><s%> their sin offering <S%H2403><s%> and their burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; and such things have befallen <S%H7122><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me: and if I had eaten <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the sin offering <S%H2403><s%> to day <S%H3117><s%>, should it have been accepted <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> ?
And when Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that, he was content <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8799><s%> <S%H5869><s%>.
